description: This function generates a trapezoid with labeled dimensions for area calculation problems. It can produce different types of trapezoids (regular, isosceles, right, left) and scales the dimensions to fit well in the figure. The generated trapezoid can be used for teaching and learning geometry, specifically the calculation of areas of trapezoids.

stimulus_type_specification.title: Available Images: Trapezoid with Labeled Dimensions
stimulus_type_specification.description: This function can draw different types of trapezoids (regular, isosceles, right, left) with labeled dimensions. It accepts inputs for the base, top length, height, unit, and type of the trapezoid. The function scales the dimensions to ensure the trapezoid fits well in the figure. This visualization can be used for teaching and learning the calculation of areas of trapezoids.

details: base: The length of the base of the trapezoid
top_length: The length of the top of the trapezoid
height: The height of the trapezoid
unit: The unit of measurement for the dimensions
trapezoid_type: The type of the trapezoid (regular, isosceles, right, left)
All dimensions must be positive numbers
The unit must be a valid unit of measurement
The type of the trapezoid must be one of the specified types (regular, isosceles, right, left)
The function draws a trapezoid with labeled dimensions
The trapezoid can be of different types (regular, isosceles, right, left)
The dimensions of the trapezoid are scaled to fit well in the figure
